Bash(# Function to count lines and generate file structure
cd /mnt/c/github/professsional-towing-updates

# Root level files
echo ""Counting root files...""
wc -l README.md claude.md components.json dev.log eslint.config.mjs next-env.d.ts next.config.ts package.json postcss.config.mjs tailwind.config.ts tsconfig.json 2>/dev/null | grep -v total

# Public files
echo -e ""\nCounting public files...""
wc -l public/*.svg 2>/dev/null | grep -v total

# Source files
echo -e ""\nCounting src files...""
find src -type f \( -name ""*.ts"" -o -name ""*.tsx"" -o -name ""*.css"" -o -name ""*.js"" -o -name ""*.jsx"" \) -exec wc -l {} \; | sort

# Supabase files
echo -e ""\nCounting supabase files...""
find supabase -type f -name ""*.sql"" -exec wc -l {} \;)
